name: Dark Slowbro
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: It loves nothing better than to be left alone, and so sometimes ends up being manipulated by unscrupulous people.

abilities.name: Reel In
abilities.effect: When you play Dark Slowbro from your hand, choose up to 3 Basic Pokémon and/or Evolution cards from your discard pile and put them into your hand.

attacks.name: Fickle Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
